articles.author: Aimee  Picchi
articles.title: Astronomer board investigating CEO Andy Byron after Coldplay kiss-cam video - CBS News
articles.description: Tech company Astronomer said its board has launched an investigation after CEO Andy Byron was seen embracing a coworker at a Coldplay concert.
articles.content: The technology company Astronomer said Friday that its board of directors has started a formal investigation after its CEO, Andy Byron, was shown embracing a woman on a screen during a Coldplay conce… [+2738 chars]

articles.author: Scott Stump
articles.title: Dylan Dreyer Shares She and Husband Brian Fichera Have Separated - TODAY.com
articles.description: The TODAY show's Dylan Dreyer announced on Friday, July 18, that she and her husband, Brian Fichera, have separated after 12 years of marriage.
articles.content:
TODAY meteorologist and co-host Dylan Dreyer announced on Friday, July 18, that she and her husband, Brian Fichera, have separated after 12 years of marriage.
